functions.name: search
functions.desc: Search Wikipedia for an article with the given title, and get its content. If no such article is found, return similar article names.

msg.content: What are the official websites of the five most populous cities in the world?

msg.name: search

msg.content:
It seems that I couldn't directly retrieve the information from Wikipedia. However, I can provide you with the official websites of the five most populous cities in the world based on general knowledge:

1. **Tokyo, Japan**: [Tokyo Metropolitan Government](https://www.metro.tokyo.lg.jp/english/)
2. **Delhi, India**: [Delhi Government](http://delhi.gov.in/)
3. **Shanghai, China**: [Shanghai Municipal People's Government](http://www.shanghai.gov.cn/)
4. **São Paulo, Brazil**: [Prefeitura de São Paulo](https://www.prefeitura.sp.gov.br/)
5. **Mexico City, Mexico**: [Government of Mexico City](https://www.cdmx.gob.mx/)

These links lead to the official government websites of each city.

It seems that I couldn't directly retrieve the information from Wikipedia. However, I can provide you with the official websites of the five most populous cities in the world based on general knowledge:

1. **Tokyo, Japan**: [Tokyo Metropolitan Government](https://www.metro.tokyo.lg.jp/english/)
2. **Delhi, India**: [Delhi Government](http://delhi.gov.in/)
3. **Shanghai, China**: [Shanghai Municipal People's Government](http://www.shanghai.gov.cn/)
4. **São Paulo, Brazil**: [Prefeitura de São Paulo](https://www.prefeitura.sp.gov.br/)
5. **Mexico City, Mexico**: [Government of Mexico City](https://www.cdmx.gob.mx/)

These links lead to the official government websites of each city.
